title: A Shadowcrest Christmas
description:
A question asked through bounding love. An emphatic answer given without reservation. But miracles and the unexpected will turn their world upside down. 
This Christmas season, Riley and her mates will face the unpredictable and carve a new path into the unknown.Will the unexpected strengthen their bond? Or will the havoc drive an immovable wedge between them? Only the future will tell.*****
A Shadowcrest Christmas
 is a Shadowcrest Pack Series novella. This is a reverse harem, paranormal romance featuring one female with five males; that is a fast burn story containing M/M and F/M/M/M/M/M sexual themes suitable for +18 audience. 
Trigger Warnings
: This book includes mentions of past sexual assault, physical abuse and violence, swearing, and PTSD.
author: B. Livingstone
